projects.title: Movie App
projects.description: Web aplication were the user can see the movies that were registered, and interact with them in a pletitude of way some of them beeing, favoriting, commenting, finding other users that like the same movie, searching for movies that share genres and befriending other users.

projects.title: To Do List
projects.description: This project was developed when I started studying React, so it shows the basic usage of React hooks, you can compare it to more recent projects to see the evolution.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: This project was firstly developed using plane HTML CSS and JS, after having some maintainabiliy problems with plane HTML I decided to adpt it to React. Here I built a modern looking landing page, with consise but important information about me and my works.

aboutMe.title: ABOUT ME
aboutMe.text: This project was firstly developed using plane HTML CSS and JS, but after studying React and having some maintainabiliy problems with plane HTML I decided to adapt it to React, you can compare the old-html branch with the main React branch for the process. Here I decided to build a modern-looking landing page, with concise but important information about me and my work.
